descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the models and textures of spell tomes. It is not compatible with other mods that do the same thing.
Thanks to a tip from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7842960]x0ne[/url], the mod also replaces the books in loading screens.

[color=#ffff00][u][b]Spell Tome Replacers:[/b][/u][/color]

- This version replaces ALL the spell tomes in the game.
- To install, download the file and extract it into your Skyrim Data folder. No esp is needed.
- To uninstall, delete the files installed by this mod. The game will revert to using the vanilla spell book models.

[color=#ffff00][u][b]Master Spell Tome Replacers:[/b][/u][/color]

- This version replaces only the books that teach Master spells.
- To install, extract the file into your Skyrim Data folder, and activate the esp included.
- To uninstall, uncheck Master Spell Tome Replacers.esp in your Skyrim Launcher, then delete the files installed by this mod.

[color=#ffff00][u][b]HQ Paper Versions:[/b][/u][/color]

- These files provide compatibility with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/661910/?]Anarin[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5988/?]HQ Paper[/url] mod. Use only if you have that mod installed. My files should overwrite Anarin's.

[color=#ffff00][u][b]Acknowledgments:[/b][/u][/color]

This mod uses files from "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35399/?]Book Covers Skyrim[/url]", by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3204267/]DanielCoffey[/url].
author: AlanovichRomanov
